CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February, 28, 1953, pg. 17 reads: "Birthday Testimonial for Mrs. Robert L. Vann Is Tremendous! - "The Mayor - Mayor David L. Lawrence pays tribute to the "First Lady" of the Courier."
TitMainTitle: David L. Lawrence speaking at microphone between two unknown women, with P. L. Prattis on left and Jessie Vann, Toki Schalk Johnson, and Bill Nunn Sr. on right on stage with ferns and sunburst patterned curtain, possibly Syria Mosque, for birthday testimonial for Jessie Vann
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lawrence, David Leo, 1889-1966.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stages (Platforms)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Curtains--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Microphone--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Prattis, P. L.
